start.speaker: Mirka
start.text:
We don’t fight the unknown with faith. We fight it with numbers.

Tell me what you see, not what you fear.

choices.text: I’ll measure the breach. No guessing.
Sometimes you have to act before you know.

end.speaker: Narrator
end.text: Chalk marks appear where Mirka points. The wall looks less like a mystery and more like a problem with an address.
